fields.title: Answer:
fields.value:
Test in prod refers to testing in production. It's a phrase Andre Cronje (creator of YFI) uses as a disclaimer for the products he builds.
It means Andre is shipping new products, like Vaults, before they go through exhaustive testing and security audits. This is why there is a disclaimer on every yearn product.
The concept of "test in prod" was also been embraced by the community, even seeing it on hoodies or tweets.
